questions.instructions: Complete the sentences with the correct word or phrase.

qa_pairs.item:
¹__________ careful! (Be / Are / You)
²Please __________ late for class. (no be / don’t be / not be)
³__________ go to the park. (Let’s / Let us to / Let)
⁴__________ my cake! (Eat not / No eat / Don’t eat)
⁵I’m tired. __________ sit down. (Let’s / We / Don’t)
⁶__________ to your teacher. (You are listen / Listen you / Listen)
qa_pairs.answer: ¹Be, ²don’t be, ³Let’s, ⁴Don’t eat, ⁵Let’s, ⁶Listen

questions.instructions: Complete the sentences with the correct word or phrase.

qa_pairs.item:
¹Please __________ early tomorrow. (arrives / arriving / arrive)
²__________ start the project today. (Let / Let to / Let’s)
³__________ noise in the library! (Make not / Don’t make / No making)
⁴__________ your shoes before bed. (Removing / Remove / Removes)
⁵__________ finish this later. (We / Don’t / Let’s)
⁶Please __________ in the form. (fill / fills / filling)
qa_pairs.answer: ¹arrive, ²Let’s, ³Don’t make, ⁴Remove, ⁵Let’s, ⁶fill

questions.instructions: Complete the sentences with the correct word or phrase.
